mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TB_1.FNL_MDFC_DTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD AMHH:MI:SS', 'nls_date_language=korean') AS FNL_MDFC_DTM , TB_1.ASN_TF_DV_CD AS ASN_TF_DV_CD , TB_2.OG_NM AS BF_OG_NM , TB_1.BFCH_ICHR_PRTNR_NO AS BF_CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , TB_2.PRTNR_KNM AS BF_PRTNR_KNM , TB_3.OG_NM AS AF_OG_NM , TB_1.TF_CNFM_PRTNR_NO AS AF_CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , TB_3.PRTNR_KNM AS AF_PRTNR_KNM , TB_1.TF_CNFMDT AS TF_CNFMDT , TB_1.TF_AK_RSON_CD AS TF_AK_RSON_CD , TB_5.OG_NM AS TF_OG_NM , TB_5.PRTNR_KNM AS TF_PRTNR_KNM , TB_5.OG_TP_CD AS TF_OG_TP_CD , TB_5.PRTNR_NO AS TF_PRTNR_NO , TB_5.OG_ID AS TF_OG_ID FROM TB_SVPD_ASN_RS_TF_IZ TB_1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS TB_2 ON ( TB_1.BFCH_ICHR_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = TB_2.OG_TP_CD AND TB_1.BFCH_ICHR_PRTNR_NO = TB_2.PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS TB_3 ON ( TB_1.TF_CNFM_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = TB_3.OG_TP_CD AND TB_1.TF_CNFM_PRTNR_NO = TB_3.PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ TB_4 ON ( TB_1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = TB_4.CST_SV_ASN_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ TB_5 ON ( TB_1.TF_AK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = TB_5.OG_TP_CD AND TB_1.TF_AK_PRTNR_NO = TB_5.PRTNR_NO AND TB_4.ASN_OJ_YM = TB_5.BASE_YM AND TB_5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.TF_STAT_CD = '20' -- 확정완료 공통코드(ASN_TF_STAT_CD) AND TB_1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo}
